article_title: Barstow seeks cure for increasing medical demand
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox.

article_metadata.description: BARSTOW — About a year ago, Dr. Ravin­dra Gautam and his wife, Dr. Maharaj Gautam, announced plans to expand their practices in Barstow.They purchased and renovated a building on West Main Street that was once the Palm Cafe. The project allowed the Gautams to move their practices from a smaller office on Seventh Street to a larger facility."My philosophy is go bigger or go home. If you are going to do something, do it right,” Dr. Maharaj Gautam said at the time.With extra
